com.guardtime.ksi

Interface Signer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    KSI

    public interface Signer
extends Closeable
    Signing data or data hash, synchronously or asynchronously. An instance of this class can be obtained using SignerBuilder class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(byte[] bytes)
      Signs the byte array asynchronously.
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash)
      Signs the data hash asynchronously.
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash, long level)
      This method is used to sign data hash asynchronously with user provided aggregation tree height.
      Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(File file)
      Signs the file asynchronously.
      AggregatorConfiguration getAggregatorConfiguration()
      Deprecated. 
      Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSISigningService.getAggregationConfiguration() in pair with KSISigningService.registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. To acquire instance of KSISigningService which a KSI instance uses, call getSigningService().
      KSISigningService getSigningService()
      Gets the signing service that the SDK was initialized with.
      KSISignature sign(byte[] bytes)
      Signs the byte array.
      KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash)
      Signs the data hash.
      KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash, long level)
      Signs the data hash with user provided aggregation tree height.
      KSISignature sign(File file)
      Signs the file.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash)
           throws KSIException
        Signs the data hash.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        KSI signature (KSISignature).
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(DataHash dataHash,
                  long level)
           throws KSIException
        Signs the data hash with user provided aggregation tree height.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign. not null.
        level - aggregation tree height.
        Returns:
        instance of KSISignature
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(File file)
           throws KSIException
        Signs the file. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        file - file to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        KSI signature (KSISignature).
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • sign

        KSISignature sign(byte[] bytes)
           throws KSIException
        Signs the byte array. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm).
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        KSI signature (KSISignature).
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash)
                        throws KSIException
        Signs the data hash asynchronously. Use method Future.getResult() to get the KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        Instance of Future.
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(DataHash dataHash,
                               long level)
                        throws KSIException
        This method is used to sign data hash asynchronously with user provided aggregation tree height. Use method Future.getResult() to get KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        dataHash - instance of DataHash to sign. not null.
        level - aggregation tree height.
        Returns:
        instance of Future
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g when communication with KSI service fails)

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(File file)
                        throws KSIException
        Signs the file asynchronously. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm). Use method Future.getResult() to get the KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        file - file to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        Instance of Future.
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • asyncSign

        Future<KSISignature> asyncSign(byte[] bytes)
                        throws KSIException
        Signs the byte array asynchronously. Uses hash algorithm defined by method KSIBuilder.setDefaultSigningHashAlgorithm(HashAlgorithm). Use method Future.getResult() to get the KSI signature.
        Parameters:
        bytes - file to sign, not null.
        Returns:
        Instance of Future
        Throws:
        KSIException - when error occurs (e.g. when communication with KSI service fails).

      • getSigningService

        KSISigningService getSigningService()
        Gets the signing service that the SDK was initialized with. E.g. to get access to signing service's configuration.

      • getAggregatorConfiguration

        @Deprecated
AggregatorConfiguration getAggregatorConfiguration()
                                                        throws KSIException
        Deprecated. Deprecated since 4.10. Use KSISigningService.getAggregationConfiguration() in pair with KSISigningService.registerAggregatorConfigurationListener(ConfigurationListener) instead. To acquire instance of KSISigningService which a KSI instance uses, call getSigningService().
        Asks aggregation configuration from KSI gateway/aggregator. Only supported if PduVersion.V2 is used.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if KSI is initialized with a service not a client.
        KSIException
